      • createWorkbook

        public org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook createWorkbook(java.lang.String name,
                                                           java.lang.String subFolder)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new xlxs spreadsheet. This will probably be integrated into the getSpreadsheet() method later later.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the spreadsheet.
        subFolder - The folder you want to have it in. use an empty sting for no folder.
        Returns:
        The workbook.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Standard file problem exception when writing to files.
